name: Jungle Bird

ingredients.name: Demerara syrup (one part demerara sugar, one part water)

preparation:
This classic Tiki drink was created in 1978 at the Aviary bar of the Kuala Lumpur Hilton.

Fill a mixing glass three-quarters with ice, and add all of the ingredients.

Shake until chilled for about 30 seconds.

Strain into a rocks glass over ice cubes or one large piece of ice, and add the garnish.
